ModMetaData.name: RimTalk Memory Patch
ModMetaData.author: Community Enhancement
ModMetaData.description:
为 RimTalk 提供四层记忆系统支持！
Memory system support for RimTalk with Four-Layer Architecture!
核心功能 / Core Features： • 四层记忆架构 - ABM/SCM/ELS/CLPA 分层管理 Four-Layer Memory - ABM/SCM/ELS/CLPA hierarchical system
• ABM (Active Buffer Memory) - 超短期记忆，当前对话上下文 ABM - Ultra-short term, current conversation context
• SCM (Situational Context Memory) - 短期记忆，最近几天的事件 SCM - Short-term, recent days' events and interactions
• ELS (Event Log Summary) - 中期记忆，AI 总结的阶段性事件 ELS - Medium-term, AI-summarized periodic events
• CLPA (Colony Lore & Persona Archive) - 长期记忆，核心人设和里程碑 CLPA - Long-term, core persona and major milestones
• AI 智能总结 - 自动将短期记忆总结为精简的中长期记忆 AI Summarization - Auto-convert short-term to concise long-term memories
• 记忆编辑器 - 手动编辑、固定和管理各层级记忆 Memory Editor - Manually edit, pin, and manage memories at all layers
• 公共 API - RimTalk 可调用完整记忆数据 Public API - RimTalk can access complete memory data
---
使用方法 / How to use： 1. 启用 Harmony 2. 启用 RimTalk (cj.rimtalk) 3. 启用此补丁 (cj.rimtalk.memorypatch) 4. 在 RimTalk 设置中配置 AI API（可选，用于智能总结） 5. 重启游戏
1. Enable Harmony 2. Enable RimTalk (cj.rimtalk) 3. Enable this patch (cj.rimtalk.memorypatch) 4. Configure AI API in RimTalk settings (optional, for AI summarization) 5. Restart game
---
RimTalk 集成 / RimTalk Integration： 本 Mod 提供完整的分层记忆数据支持。 RimTalk 可通过 API 获取不同层级的记忆，实现上下文感知对话。
This mod provides complete hierarchical memory data support. RimTalk can access different memory layers via API for context-aware conversations.
技术特性 / Technical Features： • 异步 AI 总结，不阻塞游戏主线程 Async AI summarization without blocking main thread • 回调机制，安全的跨线程更新 Callback mechanism for safe cross-thread updates • 自动化部署脚本 Automated deployment script
详细文档 / Documentation： GitHub: https://github.com/sanguodxj-byte/RimTalk-MemoryPatch
